John George

  1. Foster Name: George John
  2. Foster Family: Franklin and Ida Rutan
  3. Location of Family: Dorchester, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Dorchester, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 11/5/1900, New York City, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Victor Remer to June Rutan James, 16 February 2005; Alice A. Bogardus to Ida Rutan, 6 March 1913, likely from Children's Aid Society archives, copy in file
